article_title: Campaign 2014: DSCC attacks Thom Tillis in ‘Luxury’
article_text: - In this ad, paid for by the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee, Senate candidate Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) is criticized for cuts made to the state's education budget. ()
